page.title: 06Industry
page.content: The largest employer in the area is British Aerospace.The aerodrome at Woodford was built in 1925 after the land had been purchased from a farmer. The one condition of selling the land was that the farmers family would be employed for life.The last of the Holland family still lives in a farm house near the first hangars that were built.He retired a few years ago. In world war 2 the aerodrome was used for making Lancaster bombers.They made about 29 a month with the help of four companies.The companies were Metropolitan Vickers,Armstrong Whitworth,Vickers (West Bromich and Chester) and Austin Motor Company.
